features.otherFeatures: Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport, Pool

residential.headline: UNDER CONTRACT | Top Spot Apartment with Private Rooftop Space and Expansive Terrace
residential.description:
This apartment was the display apartment for this highly successful development,Twin Peaks.
Three car spaces plus generous storage! One of a kind!
With prized North East aspect, this apartment offers the space and privacy of a home with the security and convenience of apartment living. It's also unique for it's exclusive use of the rooftop area with 2 terraces and views
Once inside the apartment feels light and spacious, enhanced by lofty 2.75M approx. high ceilings. Beautifully framed by white plantation shutters, the living and dining area extend seamlessly to the private outdoor terrace and captures a pleasant outlook.
Featuring a gourmet kitchen with gas and stainless steel appliances, it is a perfect size with ample storage.
There are two large bedrooms one with an ensuite and each have built in wardrobes.
It has exclusive use of a completely separated rooftop storage space with bathroom and air conditionining plus an enormous terrace with fantastic views that overlooks Barker College oval and has views all the way to the Blue Mountains.
As well as the standard lock up garage there is an additional storage area in the basement car park with double lock up garage, therefore providing secure parking for 3 cars + storage
Other features include; security intercom, resort style pool and one level of visitor parking.
Moments to Westfield shops, trains and premier schools, it will prove a lasting investment.

features.otherFeatures: Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport

residential.headline: Marquis - LAST TWO REMAINING 1 bedroom+ Study - Completion November 2018
residential.description:
Last two remaining 1 bedroom plus study ground floor apartments with courtyard, parking and storage is waiting for you. Situated in a prized position on Gordon's west side, stroll to shops, station and schools. Designed with the discerning North Shore buyer in mind, they exude a quiet luxury and refined style.
APARTMENT FEATURES - Polished Timber Floors in Kitchens - Flowing interior living spaces - Master bedroom with ensuite - Built in wardrobes - Miele kitchen appliances - Gas points to living areas - Reverse cycle, ducted air conditioning - Security parking
THE LOCATION Gordon is an established, prestige suburb of the Sydney's North Shore. With a history going back to settlement for its rich farm land and grand estates. This legacy has continued to evolve with a closely monitored development policy, protecting the many fine homes and heritage of this beautiful suburb.
SHOPS Station & Local Shops - 10 min walk North shore shopping villages nearby include; Gordon, Lindfield, St Ives
SCHOOLS Schools - a short walk to or a few stops on the train line to Sydney's finest schools:
Ravenswood Pymble Ladies College Knox Grammar Roseville College or Train to Loreto, Aloysius at Kirribilli station, Barker and Abbotsleigh near Wahroonga station
University Of Technology Ku-Ring-Gai Campus - 5 mins by car Macquarie University - 10 mins by car
WORK Chatswood business district - 10 mins by train North Sydney - approx 20 mins by train Sydney CBD - approx 25 mins by train Macquarie Business Park - approx 10 mins by car
Harvie Group Real Estate 93 Grandview Street, Pymble By appointment Monday to Saturday 9.00am - 5.00 pm. Contact George Rogers - 0418 405 699 | Julia Xia 0450 808 268

residential.headline: 80% SOLD! - CONSTRUCTION COMMENCING SHORTLY
residential.description:
These contemporary apartments have been designed to offer the sophistication and style of modern urban living while embracing the natural beauty of one of the Upper North Shores most desirable suburbs.
A selection of 2 bedroom apartments offer urban sophistication in the leafy, relaxed suburb of Asquith. Creative interiors see large open living spaces open onto terraces and balconies.
Quality finishes and a neutral colour palette throughout create a sense of space that is in harmony with the natural surrounds.
In a boutique block of 30 on 4 levels, these perfectly located apartments are the ideal first home or investment.
LOCATION Set within a leafy enclave they offer a secluded retreat while being moments to transport and easy access to retail and business centres; Hornsby, Macquarie, St Ives and Chatswood. Premier schools nearby include Barker College, Abbotsleigh, Knox, Loreto, Hornsby Girls, Asquith High and St Patricks Primary.
In the heart of some of Sydneys most picturesque regions, with the beautiful waterways of The Hawkesbury River, national parks and several golf courses all within a short drive. Asquith is a true lifestyle destination with all the benefits of city living.
Visit our display 455 Pacific Highway, Asquith from 12pm - 2pm Saturday's or by appointment.

features.otherFeatures: Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport

residential.headline: CONSTRUCTION STARTED - MOUNT COLAH GARDENS
residential.description:
DISPLAY - 455 Pacific Highway, Asquith; Open Saturday 12pm-2pm.
Move in for Christmas 2017
Over 90% SOLD - 73 Architecturally Inspired Boutique Apartments - Mount Colah Gardens
Secure one of these exceptional homes. An exciting opportunity for those seeking high standards of living and luxury in a brand new home. These inspired apartments feature large rooms with flowing spaces that open to generous outdoor terraces, include all the features you would expect. They are designed to capture light and the landscaped garden views.
A selection of one bedroom apartment layouts are available, each with the highest attention to detail, with premier fittings and finishes including fly screens.
They all include secure parking and storage, although being so close to two stations you may not need to use your car.
Set in beautiful Mount Colah, surrounded by National Parks yet only a short drive to everything you need at nearby Hornsby.
- Premier school and shops in nearby Hornsby - Hornsby Girls High School catchment - Asquith Golf Club - Walk to Mount Colah train station (5 mins) - Express trains to CBD and Western Sydney via nearby Hornsby - Easy access to Sydney CBD via M1
Built by quality developer, Melkonian Constructions, with a solid track record in and around the Upper North Shore.
FIRST HOME BUYERS - Government Grants/Rebates applicable

residential.headline: UNDER CONTRACT - Modern 2 Bedroom Apartment - Excellent Location
residential.description:
First time being offered, this two bedroom, well thought out apartment is located on a third level of rear block, moments to Westfield shops, trains and premier schools.
Features large glass sliding doors lead onto balcony, open plan living with split system air conditioning, timber floors, gas kitchen with stainless steel appliances and solid double brick internal walls.
Mirrored built in robes to bedrooms which enjoy natural light and ventilation. Other features include; Lock up garage, security intercom, resort style pool and one level of visitor parking.
Internal 81m2 Balcony 16m2 Parking 22m2 (approx.)
Contact agent to inspect by appointment contact Michael Caccamo - 0432 054 616 or Julia Xia 0450 808 268

residential.headline: Amoré - Boutique Designer Apartments - Selling Off The Plan
residential.description:
50% SOLD: DISPLAY - 455 Pacific Highway, Asquith; Open Saturday 12pm-2pm.
These beautiful apartments offer the essence of contemporary living. Flowing light filled interiors that enhance the sense of space throughout, as well as carefully considered finishes and colour palette combine for ideal modern living.
They include a selection of two bedroom apartments which feature generous open living spaces that flow onto terraces and balconies. While bedrooms include built in wardrobes and an ensuite to the master. Quality finishes and a neutral colour palette throughout are harmonious with the natural surrounds.
In a boutique 4 level block of 32 these perfectly located apartments will be in high demand for first home buyers, investors and downsizers.
LOCATION Ideally positioned in Asquith's premier street in the heart of the suburb. So central it incorporates the Asquith post office, a charming village hub. Framed by landscaped grounds it settles into the surrounding landscape with ease. This private designer retreat is just moments to transport and easy access to retail and business centres at ; Hornsby, Macquarie and St Ives. Elite schools nearby include Barker College, Abbotsleigh, Knox, Loreto, Hornsby Girls, Asquith High and St Patricks Primary.
In the heart of some of Sydney's most picturesque regions, with the beautiful waterways of the Hawkesbury River, national parks and several golf courses all within a short drive. Asquith is a true lifestyle destination with all the benefits of city living.

residential.headline: Exclusive boutique apartments - CONSTRUCTION UNDERWAY
residential.description:
'UPTON' TRUE LUXURY IS A WAY OF LIVING.
Completion only 8-10 weeks away.
First home buyers exempt stamp duty. Do not miss opportunity!
'Upton' Pymble's premier apartments - designed for always. Defined by enduring quality and lasting luxury, to be lived in, loved and passed on through the generations.
With this building having been fully sold off plan in just 2 weeks, seize this opportunity on this resale as it offers a buyer to be part of this desirable project again.
INTERIOR BEAUTY Exceptional interiors blend a minimal aesthetic with luxury finishes. The apartment is thoughtfully designed with attention to the finer detail for a beautiful lifestyle experience.
Some of these features include; timber floors throughout kitchen and living, Stainless steel european appliances including integrated dishwasher, Caersarstone benches, Reverse cycle air-conditioning comfort of carpeted bedrooms and Mosaic feature walled bathrooms. The apartment is provided with security parking and separate lock up storage.
OUTDOOR STYLE The terrace connects the interior to the outdoor in seamless flow. Luxury inclusions such as gas bbq outlet and faucets, beautiful gardens and common areas are managed with ease.
PYMBLE LIVING Only a few minutes walk to Pymble Ladies College, Pymble station and a short walk or drive to the North Shore's finest schools, premier shopping centres, four golf clubs, tennis courts, sporting facilities, parklands and nature reserves.
Local Pymble features: - Pymble Ladies College (2 Min walk) - Pymble train station (2 min walk) - West Pymble farmers market (5 min drive) - Pymble cafes and restaurants (5 min walk) - Pymble Public school (10 min walk)
Harvie Group Real Estate 93 Grandview Street, Pymble By appointment Monday to Saturday 9.00am - 5.00 pm. Contact Michael Caccamo 0432 054 616 | Julia Xia 0450 808 268

features.otherFeatures: Car Parking - Basement, Carpeted, Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport, Penthouse

residential.headline: PENTHOUSE APARTMENT
residential.description:
Oversized terraces formal & informal use with access of most rooms. Sunny aspects offering excellent district views.
Being first is the philosophy behind the design for One Bel Air. First in luxury, quality and lifestyle. One Bel Air is a boutique development. Defined by an upgrade of premier finishes only to the penthouse and luxury details designed to enhance everyday living and offer the ultimate lifestyle.
FEATURES
- Beautifully appointed designer kitchen - Fully tiled living areas - Polyurethane and timber veneer - European stainless steel appliances - Stone bench tops - Gas stove tops - Dishwasher
Stylish, contemporary bathrooms including: - Floor to ceiling tiles - Luxury quality fixtures and finishes
- Generous outdoor living spaces with BBQ gas points - Fully tiled terrace - Instantaneous gas hot water system - Reverse cycle air conditioning and internal laundry - Security access parking for 2 cars and 2 storage
Ideally located in the scenic beauty of the Upper North Shore, One Bel Air is conveniently positioned to enjoy the best the area has to offer, being only moments to:
- Westfield Shopping Centre, enjoy casual and fine dining experiences - Newly rebuilt aquatic centre and golf course - Premier public, selective and private schools and a local TAFE college - Hornsby railway and bus interchange; considered the junction of the Sydney train network with frequent intercity and express services to the CBD, Chatswood, Central Coast & Newcastle
An exceptional opportunity to be first, in timeless luxury and lasting quality. One Bel Air - first always.

features.otherFeatures: Car Parking - Basement, Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport

residential.headline: SOLD! Luxury Penthouse Apartment
residential.description:
Nestled in a private, leafy enclave of prestigious St Ives, Eden apartments combine refined luxury with the best of contemporary living. Architect designed, harmoniously proportioned spaces, integrated outdoor living and beautiful landscaped vistas, with magnificent district views.
This gorgeous apartment offers some individual upgrades by its lovely owners such as living areas covered in hardwood blackbutt timber flooring, high quality fly screens, security proof balcony door and additional storage space.
Beautifully crafted interior and masterful design combine to create private, elegant spaces. Large flexible living areas flow seamlessly to outdoor terrace with lush green outlook.
Elegant kitchen with discreet soft closing cabinetry and designer finishes in natural, muted tones complement the stylish interiors without dominating. Features a premium collection of Bosh appliances, caesarstone bench top, glass splash back and polyurethane cabinetry.
Each bedroom is generously proportioned and includes built in wardrobes. The master bedroom includes a designer ensuite. The main bathroom and ensuite are both luxuriously appointed with quality fittings, frameless glass screens and fully tiled with a limestone feature wall.
The apartment also includes; ducted air conditioning, security access, secure private storage and secure parking for up to 2-3 cars.
Set in a quiet tree lined street in landscaped gardens with majestic mature trees, it is an oasis of serene luxury.

features.otherFeatures: Car Parking - Basement, Close to Schools, Close to Shops, Close to Transport

residential.headline: COMPLETION END OF 2017 - NEW GREYGUM ESTATE
residential.description:
Inspired by the private park land setting, these luxury designer apartments embrace the landscape to create a sophisticated urban oasis.
Expertly designed to offer an exceptional lifestyle, The Grove, Greygum Estate features apartments of above average proportions with integrated indoor/outdoor living. Beautifully landscaped grounds and natural park land provide lush vistas and privacy.
Selection of two bedrooms + study ranging in size internally from 112m2 - 143m2. Choice of private terrace settings overlooking bush reserve or garden courtyards with landscaped grounds.
Interior design is by Greg Natale Design, Belle Coco Republic Interior designer of the year 2011 & 2014, who brings his classic contemporary style to these exceptional apartments. They include understated luxury finishes and fittings throughout. The sense of a private home has been created.
LOCATION In the exclusive new land release, Greygum Estate, The Grove feels private, yet is only a short walk or drive to nearby schools, shops and the new rail link.
These fine new apartments celebrate the best of Sydney living.
TO VISIT OUR DISPLAY PLEASE CALL TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT

residential.headline: NEW Arbor Terraces - Private Luxury 40% SOLD!
residential.description:
Construction to commence at the end of September. These exemplary terraces are a nod to the tradition and grandeur of this fine suburb. Each home carefully crafted to offer spacious and refined living within this private estate. Set in lush landscaped grounds all with north facing courtyards, these beautiful homes are contemporary classics. Destined to offer the best of North Shore living for many years to come.
Exceptional quality and luxury finishes are the hallmarks of these beautiful North Shore homes. Designed for relaxed contemporary living to include a sense of privacy and space. Some of their features include:
Polished timber floors Stone benchtops Miele appliances Security intercom access Reverse cycle air conditioning Secure double car parking & storage Private landscaped courtyard
LOCATION Pymble is an established, prestige suburb of the Sydney�s North Shore. Historically known for its rich farm land and grand estates. This legacy has continued to evolve with a closely monitored development policy, protecting the heritage of this beautiful suburb. In particular this prized location offers close access to the North Shore�s premier schools; Pymble Ladies College, Knox Grammar, Barker College, Abbotsleigh, Loreto. As well as four prestigious golf clubs, tennis courts and of course some of Sydney�s best shopping at nearby Chatswood, St Ives or Hornsby centres.
